1行だけ返すSELECT

REQ Header <<36,0,0,0>> 
REQ COM_QUERY 
REQ Payload ^ ^!select * from fruit2 where id = 2 
REQ Payload <<0,1,115,101,108,101,99,116,32,42,32,102,114,111,109,32,102,114,117,105,116,50,32,119,104,101,114,101,32,105,100,32,61,32,50>> 
Loop! Socket [#Port<0.12>]
RESP Payload <<1,0,0,1,3,45,0,0,2,3,100,101,102,7,119,101,98,97,112,112,49,6,102,114,117,105,116,50,6,102,114,117,105,116,50,2,105,100,2,105,100,12,63,0,20,0,0,0,8,3,80,0,0,0,51,0,0,3,3,100,101,102,7,119,101,98,97,112,112,49,6,102,114,117,105,116,50,6,102,114,117,105,116,50,5,99,111,117,110,116,5,99,111,117,110,116,12,63,0,11,0,0,0,3,0,0,0,0,0,49,0,0,4,3,100,101,102,7,119,101,98,97,112,112,49,6,102,114,117,105,116,50,6,102,114,117,105,116,50,4,110,97,109,101,4,110,97,109,101,12,255,0,160,0,0,0,253,4,64,0,0,0,10,0,0,5,1,50,1,48,5,65,112,112,108,101,7,0,0,6,254,0,0,2,0,0,0>> 
Loop! Socket [#Port<0.12>]


4行返すSELECT

REQ Header <<23,0,0,0>> 
REQ COM_QUERY 
REQ Payload ^ ^!select * from fruit2 
REQ Payload <<0,1,115,101,108,101,99,116,32,42,32,102,114,111,109,32,102,114,117,105,116,50>> 
Loop! Socket [#Port<0.12>]
RESP Payload <<1,0,0,1,3,45,0,0,2,3,100,101,102,7,119,101,98,97,112,112,49,6,102,114,117,105,116,50,6,102,114,117,105,116,50,2,105,100,2,105,100,12,63,0,20,0,0,0,8,3,80,0,0,0,51,0,0,3,3,100,101,102,7,119,101,98,97,112,112,49,6,102,114,117,105,116,50,6,102,114,117,105,116,50,5,99,111,117,110,116,5,99,111,117,110,116,12,63,0,11,0,0,0,3,0,0,0,0,0,49,0,0,4,3,100,101,102,7,119,101,98,97,112,112,49,6,102,114,117,105,116,50,6,102,114,117,105,116,50,4,110,97,109,101,4,110,97,109,101,12,255,0,160,0,0,0,253,4,64,0,0,0,11,0,0,5,1,49,1,48,6,67,104,101,114,114,121,10,0,0,6,1,50,1,48,5,65,112,112,108,101,11,0,0,7,1,51,1,48,6,66,97,110,97,110,97,9,0,0,8,1,52,1,48,4,71,111,98,97,7,0,0,9,254,0,0,34,0,0,0>> 
Loop! Socket [#Port<0.12>]

1行インサートするINSERT

REQ Header <<59,0,0,0>> 
REQ COM_QUERY 
REQ Payload ^ ^!insert into fruit2 (id, count, name) values (4,0,"Goba") 
REQ Payload <<0,1,105,110,115,101,114,116,32,105,110,116,111,32,102,114,117,105,116,50,32,40,105,100,44,32,99,111,117,110,116,44,32,110,97,109,101,41,32,118,97,108,117,101,115,32,40,52,44,48,44,34,71,111,98,97,34,41>> 
Loop! Socket [#Port<0.12>]
RESP Payload <<7,0,0,1,0,1,0,2,0,0,0>>
